name: Problems In The Pumpkin Patch
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD: MOVE
  • LEFT SHIFT: RUN
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: ROLL
  • SPACEBAR: JUMP ( OR DOUBLE JUMP )
  • SCROLL WHEEL: MOVE CAMERA DISTANCE

_______________________________________________________________

You play as Hank The Hedgehog!

Your only goal in life is to bring pain to those around you. You chose to release this anger on a poor senile farmer.

Ruin his life by destroying all his crops! Oh, and remember to steal all his pumpkins! (They Give You Stat Boosts That Will Help In Your Road To Destruction.)

_______________________________________________________________

ASSETS:

Hedgehog / Fox: Hank The Hedgehog / Felix The Fox - OMABUARTS STUDIOS

Farm Environment Assets:  Simple Farm - SYNTY STUDIOS

Pumpkin: Low Poly Vegetables - PIXEL PROCESSOR

Trees: Low Poly Animated Park - DASHA POCHTVINA

Menu / Gameplay Song: The Old Country Farm - DARREN CURTIS MUSIC

_______________________________________________________________

Thank you for playing!

- Luke / Vacant
